statements: DELETE FROM waste_disposal_containers WHERE location = 'City Park' AND capacity < 50;
DELETE FROM waste_disposal_containers WHERE location = 'Main Street' AND current_inventory < capacity/2;
DELETE FROM restocking_history WHERE restocked_date < '2022-01-01' AND restocked_amount < 100;
DELETE FROM restocking_records WHERE restocked_by = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM restocking_records WHERE restocked_quantity < 10 AND restocked_by = 'Admin';
DELETE FROM Waste_Containers WHERE container_id = 5 AND location = 'Main Street';
DELETE FROM WasteMaterials WHERE material_name = 'Plastic' AND category = 'Recyclable';
